engChrName: Welcome, players.
engSearchText: Welcome, players.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_50_1023}来たな、参加者たちよ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_50_1023}来たな、参加者たちよ。

engChrName: I am Alexandre, the boss of round two.
engSearchText: I am Alexandre, the boss of round two.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_50_1024}自分はアレクサンドル── 第二フェーズ・中層領域を担当する。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_50_1024}自分はアレクサンドル──
第二フェーズ・中層領域を担当する。

engChrName: Melchior already laid out the rules for advancing, so I have nothing more to add on that point.
engSearchText:
Melchior already laid out the rules for advancing, so I
have nothing more to add on that point.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_50_1025}基本ルールはメルキオルが話した通り、 互いに潰し合いつつ進んでもらうことになる。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_50_1025}基本ルールはメルキオルが話した通り、
互いに潰し合いつつ進んでもらうことになる。

engChrName: I will note that only five teams were eliminated yesterday, which was well below our expectations.
engSearchText:
I will note that only five teams were eliminated
yesterday, which was well below our expectations.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_50_1026}昨日脱落したのはたったの５チーム、 これは想定していたより進みが悪い。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_50_1026}昨日脱落したのはたったの５チーム、
これは想定していたより進みが悪い。

engChrName: You will have four hours to complete this zone. Our hope is that only half of you will make it through.
engSearchText:
You will have four hours to complete this zone.
Our hope is that only half of you will make
it through.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_50_1027}中層のタイムリミットは４時間だ。 残りチームが半分になるのが理想だな。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_50_1027}中層のタイムリミットは４時間だ。
残りチームが半分になるのが理想だな。

engChrName: In this round, you will need six keycards to advance. May the best team emerge victorious.
engSearchText:
In this round, you will need six keycards to advance.
May the best team emerge victorious.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_50_1028}今回、必要なアクセスキーは６つ。 闘争を乗り越え、辿り着いてみせるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_50_1028}今回、必要なアクセスキーは６つ。
闘争を乗り越え、辿り着いてみせるがいい。

engChrName: We have three from yesterday, so we just need to get three more. It's essentially the same deal as before.
engSearchText:
We have three from yesterday, so we just need to get
three more. It's essentially the same deal as before.
jpnChrName: 必要なアクセスキーが６つ…… 昨日と合わせるとあと３つですか。
jpnSearchText:
必要なアクセスキーが６つ……
昨日と合わせるとあと３つですか。

engChrName: Our competition will be much fiercer, however. We may be fighting a more uphill battle to acquire them.
engSearchText:
Our competition will be much fiercer, however.
We may be fighting a more uphill battle to
acquire them.
jpnChrName: やはり、昨日よりも更に戦いが 激化することが予想されますね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、昨日よりも更に戦いが
激化することが予想されますね。

engChrName: Cool with me. I like a good challenge.
engSearchText: Cool with me. I like a good challenge.
jpnChrName: ハッ……むしろ望む所だろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……むしろ望む所だろ。

engChrName: I would prefer to exercise caution. We can't afford to fight everyone, so we should pick our battles wisely.
engSearchText:
I would prefer to exercise caution. We can't afford to
fight everyone, so we should pick our battles wisely.
jpnChrName: だが全てを相手にするわけにもいかぬ。 無用な戦いは避けたい所だな。
jpnSearchText:
だが全てを相手にするわけにもいかぬ。
無用な戦いは避けたい所だな。

engChrName: The more our opponents fight and eliminate each other, the better.
engSearchText:
The more our opponents fight and eliminate each
other, the better.
jpnChrName: はいっ、他の勢力同士である程度 消耗し合っているといいんですが。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、他の勢力同士である程度
消耗し合っているといいんですが。

engChrName: The fighting has already begun, it seems.
engSearchText: The fighting has already begun, it seems.
jpnChrName: ……さっそく始まりましたね。 私たちも出発した方がいいかと。
jpnSearchText:
……さっそく始まりましたね。
私たちも出発した方がいいかと。

engChrName: Probably won't be long till we run into another group, so be ready to fight at a moment's notice.
engSearchText:
Probably won't be long till we run into another group,
so be ready to fight at a moment's notice.
jpnChrName: 俺たちもどこでカチ合うか分からねえ。 全員、心の準備だけはしておけ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちもどこでカチ合うか分からねえ。
全員、心の準備だけはしておけ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい、注意して進みましょう……！
jpnSearchText: はい、注意して進みましょう……！

engChrName: Holy crap. There's a fierce battle going on in there.
engSearchText: Holy crap. There's a fierce battle going on in there.
jpnChrName: 凄まじい戦闘音です……！
jpnSearchText: 凄まじい戦闘音です……！

engChrName: I can sense spiritual reactions, too.
engSearchText: I can sense spiritual reactions, too.
jpnChrName: 強力な霊子反応まである……！
jpnSearchText: 強力な霊子反応まである……！

engChrName: Seems like one group is significantly larger than the other.
engSearchText:
Seems like one group is significantly larger than
the other.
jpnChrName: 誰かやり合っているな。 片方は少数みたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
誰かやり合っているな。
片方は少数みたいだが……

engChrName: I know that sound... It can only belong to one type of sword!
engSearchText:
I know that sound... It can only belong to one type
of sword!
jpnChrName: この剣戟の音──もしや！
jpnSearchText: この剣戟の音──もしや！

engChrName: Haaaaah!
engSearchText: Haaaaah!
jpnChrName: おらあああああっ！！
jpnSearchText: おらあああああっ！！

engChrName: Celis!
engSearchText: Celis!
jpnChrName: ──セリスさん！
jpnSearchText: ──セリスさん！

engChrName: Tch. Did someone chop your balls off or somethin'? Knock it off with those chickenshit strategies and fight me like a man.
engSearchText:
Tch. Did someone chop your balls off or somethin'?
Knock it off with those chickenshit strategies and
fight me like a man.
jpnChrName: チッ、さっきからチマチマと…… ネズミらしい戦いぶりじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
チッ、さっきからチマチマと……
ネズミらしい戦いぶりじゃねぇか？

engChrName: We will continue to use any and all tactics at our disposal until our path to victory is secure.
engSearchText:
We will continue to use any and all tactics at our
disposal until our path to victory is secure.
jpnChrName: これも戦法── 真正面から挑むなど愚の骨頂。
jpnSearchText:
これも戦法──
真正面から挑むなど愚の骨頂。

engChrName: Taking advantage of your foe's weaknesses is key, and we know you're a raging bull who can only understand the language of brute force.
engSearchText:
Taking advantage of your foe's weaknesses is key, and
we know you're a raging bull who can only
understand the language of brute force.
jpnChrName: 猛牛が如き守護騎士殿に 理解できると期待はしていないが。
jpnSearchText:
猛牛が如き守護騎士殿に
理解できると期待はしていないが。

engChrName: That's it. You've just landed the top spot on my shit list!
engSearchText:
That's it. You've just landed the top spot on my
shit list!
jpnChrName: んだとテメェ……！！
jpnSearchText: んだとテメェ……！！

engChrName: Calm yourself, Celis. They only taunt you because deep down, they know the truth of the matter:
engSearchText:
Calm yourself, Celis. They only taunt you because
deep down, they know the truth of the matter:
jpnChrName: 落ち着いてください、セリスさん。 彼らもある程度は分かっているでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
落ち着いてください、セリスさん。
彼らもある程度は分かっているでしょう。

engChrName: No matter how many monks they bring or plans they devise, defeating us is a statistical impossibility.
engSearchText:
No matter how many monks they bring or plans they
devise, defeating us is a statistical impossibility.
jpnChrName: ──手練れを集めて策を弄した所で、 セリスさんと僕には届かないことを。
jpnSearchText:
──手練れを集めて策を弄した所で、
セリスさんと僕には届かないことを。

engChrName: Hmph. We'll see about that.
engSearchText: Hmph. We'll see about that.
jpnChrName: ……利いた口を。
jpnSearchText: ……利いた口を。

engChrName: Sir, I believe now's the time fo—
engSearchText: Sir, I believe now's the time fo—
jpnChrName: 副兵長、ここは──
jpnSearchText: 副兵長、ここは──

engChrName: Oh, I know that much, Leon, and that's exactly why I'm so confused.
engSearchText:
Oh, I know that much, Leon, and that's exactly why
I'm so confused.
jpnChrName: ハッ、当然だ。 だがそれだけにどうも分からねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、当然だ。
だがそれだけにどうも分からねえ。

engChrName: You're part of the Iscariot unit, ain'tcha? Then why didn't you tell the Congregation for Divine Worship about what you're doin' here?
engSearchText:
You're part of the Iscariot unit, ain'tcha? Then why
didn't you tell the Congregation for Divine Worship
about what you're doin' here?
jpnChrName: こっちに黙って隠密僧兵（イスカリオ）で参戦── 上の典礼省にすら黙ってると来ている。
jpnSearchText:
こっちに黙って隠密僧兵（イスカリオ）で参戦──
上の典礼省にすら黙ってると来ている。

engChrName: Just what the hell are you thinking?
engSearchText: Just what the hell are you thinking?
jpnChrName: 古代遺物（アーティファクト）の処遇はともかく、 いったい何を考えてやがる……？
jpnSearchText:
古代遺物（アーティファクト）の処遇はともかく、
いったい何を考えてやがる……？

engChrName: We have no obligation to inform you of our reason for being here. And for the record, we know not of this 'Iscariot' of which you speak.
engSearchText:
We have no obligation to inform you of our reason
for being here. And for the record, we know not of
this 'Iscariot' of which you speak.
jpnChrName: 騎士団（そちら）には関係なきこと── それと我らは隠密僧兵（そんなもの）ではない。
jpnSearchText:
騎士団（そちら）には関係なきこと──
それと我らは隠密僧兵（そんなもの）ではない。

engChrName: We are merely humble travelers whose curiosity led us to this place. Is that explanation satisfactory?
engSearchText:
We are merely humble travelers whose curiosity led
us to this place. Is that explanation satisfactory?
jpnChrName: 物珍しさに惹かれて迷い込んだ旅行者ゆえ、 捨て置いてもらいたいのだが──如何に？
jpnSearchText:
物珍しさに惹かれて迷い込んだ旅行者ゆえ、
捨て置いてもらいたいのだが──如何に？

engChrName: Hell no! I'm not buying that for a second!
engSearchText: Hell no! I'm not buying that for a second!
jpnChrName: だから無理あんだろっ！！
jpnSearchText: だから無理あんだろっ！！

engChrName: *sigh* Our commander requested that we avoid quarreling with you wherever possible...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Our commander requested that we avoid
quarreling with you wherever possible...
jpnChrName: ふう、イザコザは避けるように 総長からも言われてるんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、イザコザは避けるように
総長からも言われてるんですが……

engChrName: But if a fight is what you want, who are we to say no?
engSearchText: But if a fight is what you want, who are we to say no?
jpnChrName: そちらがその気なら、構いませんね？
jpnSearchText: そちらがその気なら、構いませんね？

engChrName: I would rather not, but I'm afraid I see no other choice.
engSearchText:
I would rather not, but I'm afraid I see no
other choice.
jpnChrName: ああ──こちらも止む方なし。
jpnSearchText: ああ──こちらも止む方なし。

engChrName: It is a pity. I would much prefer the Holy City not lose two of its precious Dominions.
engSearchText:
It is a pity. I would much prefer the Holy City not
lose two of its precious Dominions.
jpnChrName: 《守護騎士（ドミニオン）》に空位ができるのは 法国にとっての損失、なるべく避けたい所だが。
jpnSearchText:
《守護騎士（ドミニオン）》に空位ができるのは
法国にとっての損失、なるべく避けたい所だが。

engChrName: Don't get ahead of yourself. You don't got a snowball's chance in HELL of beating us.
engSearchText:
Don't get ahead of yourself. You don't got a
snowball's chance in HELL of beating us.
jpnChrName: 面白ぇ…… やれるモンならやってみるか、アア？
jpnSearchText:
面白ぇ……
やれるモンならやってみるか、アア？

engChrName: It's their Stigmas...
engSearchText: It's their Stigmas...
jpnChrName: 《聖痕（スティグマ）》──
jpnSearchText: 《聖痕（スティグマ）》──

engChrName: Careful. The signs of the fourth and the eleventh are capable of immolating and freezing all in their path.
engSearchText:
Careful. The signs of the fourth and the eleventh are
capable of immolating and freezing all in their path.
jpnChrName: 第四位に第十一位── 全てを灼きつくし、全てを凍らせる徴（しるし）か……
jpnSearchText:
第四位に第十一位──
全てを灼きつくし、全てを凍らせる徴（しるし）か……

engChrName: We have no choice but to pull out our secret weapon.
engSearchText: We have no choice but to pull out our secret weapon.
jpnChrName: ならばこちらも“奥の手”を使うまで。
jpnSearchText: ならばこちらも“奥の手”を使うまで。

engChrName: Huh? What is that?
engSearchText: Huh? What is that?
jpnChrName: へえ……？
jpnSearchText: へえ……？

engChrName: It looks to be a multiplex spiritual mark, which is made manifest using their Xiphas.
engSearchText:
It looks to be a multiplex spiritual mark, which is
made manifest using their Xiphas.
jpnChrName: なるほど、恐らくザイファとやらを 応用した霊子多重法印……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、恐らくザイファとやらを
応用した霊子多重法印……

engChrName: I presume that is the fruit of your research into our own blessings. But how will it measure up to the real thing, I wonder?
engSearchText:
I presume that is the fruit of your research into our
own blessings. But how will it measure up to the real
thing, I wonder?
jpnChrName: 僕たちの“これ”を研究したようですが どこまで迫れるでしょうね？
jpnSearchText:
僕たちの“これ”を研究したようですが
どこまで迫れるでしょうね？

engChrName: We will know shortly. Now is as good a time as any to test it out.
engSearchText:
We will know shortly. Now is as good a time as any
to test it out.
jpnChrName: 格好の機会というもの── この場で確かめさせていただこう。
jpnSearchText:
格好の機会というもの──
この場で確かめさせていただこう。

engChrName: All of you—stay your weapons!
engSearchText: All of you—stay your weapons!
jpnChrName: ──双方、収めるがいい！！
jpnSearchText: ──双方、収めるがいい！！

jpnChrName: うおッ！？
jpnSearchText: うおッ！？
ッ……！！

engChrName: Master! What're you doin'?!
engSearchText: Master! What're you doin'?!
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）……！
jpnSearchText: 師父（せんせい）……！

engChrName: That's one way to make an entrance.
engSearchText: That's one way to make an entrance.
jpnChrName: どういう割り込み方だよ！？
jpnSearchText: どういう割り込み方だよ！？

engChrName: Welp. He found us.
engSearchText: Welp. He found us.
jpnChrName: ふう……見つかっちまったか。
jpnSearchText: ふう……見つかっちまったか。

engChrName: Father Bark—I mean...Master Bergard.
engSearchText: Father Bark—I mean...Master Bergard.
jpnChrName: バルク──いえ、ベルガルド先生。
jpnSearchText: バルク──いえ、ベルガルド先生。

engChrName: Is it...really him?
engSearchText: Is it...really him?
jpnChrName: ……かの名高き……
jpnSearchText: ……かの名高き……

engChrName: Then the rumors were true...
engSearchText: Then the rumors were true...
jpnChrName: まさか本当に 生きておられたとは……
jpnSearchText:
まさか本当に
生きておられたとは……
………………………………

engChrName: *sigh* I am no longer associated with the church, so my words will not hold sway in this matter...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I am no longer associated with the church, so
my words will not hold sway in this matter...
jpnChrName: 既に私は教会を離れた身── とやかく言える立場ではない。
jpnSearchText:
既に私は教会を離れた身──
とやかく言える立場ではない。

engChrName: ...but I still have a few thoughts to share as an outsider looking in.
engSearchText:
...but I still have a few thoughts to share as an
outsider looking in.
jpnChrName: だがそれ故に、私個人としての“筋”で おぬしらを質させてもらうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
だがそれ故に、私個人としての“筋”で
おぬしらを質させてもらうつもりだ。

engChrName: All of you represent either the Dominions or the monks, both of whom worship the same Goddess.
engSearchText:
All of you represent either the Dominions or the
monks, both of whom worship the same Goddess.
jpnChrName: ……同じ女神を戴く守護騎士と、 僧兵たちを代表するおぬしらが。
jpnSearchText:
……同じ女神を戴く守護騎士と、
僧兵たちを代表するおぬしらが。

engChrName: One would expect the church's elites to join hands and serve as a united front—confronting the present crisis as a collective unit.
engSearchText:
One would expect the church's elites to join hands
and serve as a united front—confronting the present
crisis as a collective unit.
jpnChrName: 罪無き数多の命が掛かっているこの局面で 手を取り合うまではいかぬとしても──
jpnSearchText:
罪無き数多の命が掛かっているこの局面で
手を取り合うまではいかぬとしても──

engChrName: Yet all I see is schoolkids bickering on a playground. Is this how members of the church conduct themselves?
engSearchText:
Yet all I see is schoolkids bickering on a playground.
Is this how members of the church
conduct themselves?
jpnChrName: よもや下らぬ縄張り争いなどに 興じたりしてはおらぬだろうな、と。
jpnSearchText:
よもや下らぬ縄張り争いなどに
興じたりしてはおらぬだろうな、と。

engChrName: Damn it. I don't got a comeback for that one.
engSearchText: Damn it. I don't got a comeback for that one.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… さすが先生、グウの音も出ねぇぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
さすが先生、グウの音も出ねぇぜ。

engChrName: Nor have I... I trust you have no qualms with putting our differences aside?
engSearchText:
Nor have I... I trust you have no qualms with putting
our differences aside?
jpnChrName: そうですね…… 貴方たちもそれで構いませんか？
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……
貴方たちもそれで構いませんか？

engChrName: We had no desire to fight to begin with, but we have even less of a desire to work with the likes of you.
engSearchText:
We had no desire to fight to begin with, but we have
even less of a desire to work with the likes of you.
jpnChrName: 元より我らに争う意志なし。 ──馴れ合うつもりも毛頭ないが。
jpnSearchText:
元より我らに争う意志なし。
──馴れ合うつもりも毛頭ないが。

engChrName: You wanna run that by me again, asshole?
engSearchText: You wanna run that by me again, asshole?
jpnChrName: てめえ……
jpnSearchText: てめえ……

engChrName: However, we recognize the folly of fighting to our mutual destruction.
engSearchText:
However, we recognize the folly of fighting to our
mutual destruction.
jpnChrName: が、潰し合うのも愚策。 そこは師の仰る通りだろう。
jpnSearchText:
が、潰し合うのも愚策。
そこは師の仰る通りだろう。

engChrName: We shall take our leave. May we meet again when this 'game' of theirs has reached its end.
engSearchText:
We shall take our leave. May we meet again when
this 'game' of theirs has reached its end.
jpnChrName: 我らは失礼する── 遊戯盤の先で会えることを祈っている。
jpnSearchText:
我らは失礼する──
遊戯盤の先で会えることを祈っている。

engChrName: I, too, had heard talk of your survival. It's good to see you are alive and well, Master.
engSearchText:
I, too, had heard talk of your survival. It's good to see
you are alive and well, Master.
jpnChrName: 先生も……噂は伝え聞きましたが 久々にお目にかかれて何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
先生も……噂は伝え聞きましたが
久々にお目にかかれて何よりです。

engChrName: Heh. Nice to see you, too.
engSearchText: Heh. Nice to see you, too.
jpnChrName: フフ、私もだ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、私もだ。

engChrName: We'd only learned he was still alive the other day...
engSearchText: We'd only learned he was still alive the other day...
jpnChrName: ったく、アタシたちですら 先日会えたばかりだってのに……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、アタシたちですら
先日会えたばかりだってのに……

engChrName: ...but it sounds like they've known for a while now.
engSearchText: ...but it sounds like they've known for a while now.
jpnChrName: あの調子じゃ先生が生きてたのを とっくに掴んでやがったみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
あの調子じゃ先生が生きてたのを
とっくに掴んでやがったみてぇだな。

engChrName: Indeed. And I have a good idea as to who their source is as well.
engSearchText:
Indeed. And I have a good idea as to who their source
is as well.

find us in the final round, prepare for hell on earth.

earth' this very moment.

engChrName: ...Excuse me?

jpnChrName: なに……？
jpnSearchText: なに……？

engChrName: Still, that can wait for after this is over.
engSearchText: Still, that can wait for after this is over.
jpnChrName: ですがこの機会でなくても結構。

guild by your side, so we shall bow out for now.

engSearchText: I'm good with not fighting you guys, too.

Heiyue by your side, so we shall bow out for now.

chance to become a little better acquainted.

engChrName: *sigh* You really doing this crap now?

engChrName: I doubt I could beat you while you have the strongest jaegers in the East by your side.
engSearchText:

jaegers in the East by your side.

engChrName: It's a damn shame. Would've loved to spar with ya.
engSearchText: It's a damn shame. Would've loved to spar with ya.
jpnChrName: ハッ、正直興味はあるがな。

engChrName: Same! But my companions here do oh-so love playing it safe.
engSearchText:

it safe.

engChrName: And they are wise to do so.

jpnChrName: それが宜しいかと。

Though it is a rare opportunity to find the two of you
in one place...

jpnSearchText:

流石に見過ごせない気もしますが……

engChrName: We'll spare you this time, though, but only because Master Bergard is with you.
engSearchText:
We'll spare you this time, though, but only because
Master Bergard is with you.

jpnSearchText:
先生が一緒ですし、
この場は見なかったことにしましょう。

engSearchText:
Today's your lucky day. We're letting you off easy this
time, old man.

jpnSearchText:
ハン……
良かったなァオッサン、また命拾いして？

engChrName: Cool. I wasn't in the mood to kill a couple of snot-nosed kids anyway.
engSearchText:
Cool. I wasn't in the mood to kill a couple of
snot-nosed kids anyway.

jpnSearchText: ああ、どこぞのイキった小娘がか？

engChrName: ...Never mind. We're throwin' hands, jackass.
engSearchText: ...Never mind. We're throwin' hands, jackass.

engChrName: Come at me anytime, girlie.
engSearchText: Come at me anytime, girlie.
jpnChrName: クク……
jpnSearchText: クク……

engChrName: It's always so lovely to see people getting along so well.
engSearchText:

so well.

jpnSearchText: 誰がだコラ！？

engChrName: Phew. Well, that could've ended a lot worse.
engSearchText: Phew. Well, that could've ended a lot worse.
jpnChrName: はあ…… 何とか丸く収まったって感じね。
jpnSearchText:
はあ……
何とか丸く収まったって感じね。

engSearchText:

many of the other participants, I think.

教会の方々は少し安心できますね。

engSearchText:
Yeah. They are more likely to put the civilians' safety

出し惜しみをするつもりなら

full hand.

without question the greatest threat of them all.

words to heart.

keycards to advance.

jpnSearchText:
そろそろアクセスキーを揃えた者も
出る頃合いだろう。

engChrName: Muster up your courage and come face me in the depths—if you dare.
engSearchText:
Muster up your courage and come face me in the
depths—if you dare.
jpnChrName: 覚悟が出来た者から 領域最奥に足を踏み入れるがいい──
jpnSearchText:
覚悟が出来た者から
領域最奥に足を踏み入れるがいい──

engChrName: One moment. The numbers he gave don't add up.
engSearchText: One moment. The numbers he gave don't add up.
jpnChrName: ……ちょっと待って…… 計算がおかしくない？
jpnSearchText:
……ちょっと待って……
計算がおかしくない？

engChrName: Twelve teams have been eliminated—seven today and five yesterday—and there are eight remaining.
engSearchText:
Twelve teams have been eliminated—seven today and
five yesterday—and there are eight remaining.
jpnChrName: 昨日脱落したのは５チーム、 今日は今の所で７チーム。
jpnSearchText:
昨日脱落したのは５チーム、
今日は今の所で７チーム。

engChrName: That would mean there are twenty teams, and that does not match the number they gave at the start.
engSearchText:
That would mean there are twenty teams, and that
does not match the number they gave at the start.
jpnChrName: 残りが８チームだとすると、 合計が２０チームになるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
残りが８チームだとすると、
合計が２０チームになるはずだ。

engChrName: Right... They said there were nineteen, didn't they?
engSearchText: Right... They said there were nineteen, didn't they?
jpnChrName: ……あれ？ でも昨日は全部で１９チームって……
jpnSearchText:
……あれ？
でも昨日は全部で１９チームって……

engChrName: Which begs the question: where did the other one come from?
engSearchText:
Which begs the question: where did the other one
come from?
jpnChrName: ……１チーム、増えている……？
jpnSearchText: ……１チーム、増えている……？

engChrName: He had to correct himself on that earlier.
engSearchText: He had to correct himself on that earlier.
jpnChrName: アレクサンドルのあの様子……
jpnSearchText: アレクサンドルのあの様子……

engChrName: Either he can't do basic math, or a new team has entered the scene. The latter's more likely to me.
engSearchText:
Either he can't do basic math, or a new team has
entered the scene. The latter's more likely to me.
jpnChrName: 単純に数え間違いじゃなく、連中にも 想定外の事態が起きてるのかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
単純に数え間違いじゃなく、連中にも
想定外の事態が起きてるのかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: That's not fair. They can't just add teams after the game's already begun!
engSearchText:
That's not fair. They can't just add teams after the
game's already begun!
jpnChrName: どうして今になって…… そもそもルール的にアリなの？
jpnSearchText:
どうして今になって……
そもそもルール的にアリなの？

engChrName: I don't think they're 'adding' anything, actually.
engSearchText: I don't think they're 'adding' anything, actually.
jpnChrName: いや、増えたんじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText: いや、増えたんじゃねぇ。

engChrName: There were supposed to be twenty teams from the start, remember?
engSearchText:
There were supposed to be twenty teams from the
start, remember?
jpnChrName: むしろ元々足りていなかったのが ようやく揃ったって感じなのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ元々足りていなかったのが
ようやく揃ったって感じなのかもな。

engChrName: Each underground entrance had one keycard allocated to it...
engSearchText:
Each underground entrance had one keycard
allocated to it...
jpnChrName: “ゲーム”への参加資格であるアクセスキーは 各地下への入口フロアに一つずつ配置されている。
jpnSearchText:
“ゲーム”への参加資格であるアクセスキーは
各地下への入口フロアに一つずつ配置されている。

engChrName: ...and every team got a card that was registered in their name, which they could use to open their assigned entrance.
engSearchText:
...and every team got a card that was registered in
their name, which they could use to open their
assigned entrance.
jpnChrName: そして、発見された入口は確保したチームによって アクセスキー取得とチームの登録が行われた。
jpnSearchText:
そして、発見された入口は確保したチームによって
アクセスキー取得とチームの登録が行われた。

engChrName: But one of those entrances went unused. And that was...
engSearchText:
But one of those entrances went unused. And
that was...
jpnChrName: 一箇所だけ──例外を除いてな。
jpnSearchText: 一箇所だけ──例外を除いてな。

engChrName: ...the one we were meant to use!
engSearchText: ...the one we were meant to use!
jpnChrName: 俺たちが使う予定だった入口か……！
jpnSearchText: 俺たちが使う予定だった入口か……！

engChrName: Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption that the guild was using that entrance.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption
that the guild was using that entrance.
jpnChrName: ああ、ギルドに確保されたと思われて、 誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ギルドに確保されたと思われて、
誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。

engChrName: ...the one we were going to use!
engSearchText: ...the one we were going to use!
jpnChrName: ……！ 私たちが使う予定だった入口ですか！
jpnSearchText:
……！
私たちが使う予定だった入口ですか！

engChrName: Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption that Heiyue was using that entrance.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption
that Heiyue was using that entrance.
jpnChrName: そうだ、黒月に確保されたと思われて、 誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、黒月に確保されたと思われて、
誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。

engChrName: ...the one we were going to use, right?
engSearchText: ...the one we were going to use, right?
jpnChrName: なるほど──私たちが 使う予定だった入口だね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど──私たちが
使う予定だった入口だね。

engChrName: Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption that Ikaruga was using that entrance.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption
that Ikaruga was using that entrance.
jpnChrName: そうだ、斑鳩に確保されたと思われて、 誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、斑鳩に確保されたと思われて、
誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。

engChrName: ...ours. So someone stole it, eh? Bold move.
engSearchText: ...ours. So someone stole it, eh? Bold move.
jpnChrName: クク──俺らが使う予定だった 入口を掠め取ったってか？
jpnSearchText:
クク──俺らが使う予定だった
入口を掠め取ったってか？

engChrName: Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption that the society was using that entrance.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Everyone was workin' under the assumption
that the society was using that entrance.
jpnChrName: そうだ、結社に確保されたと思われて、 誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、結社に確保されたと思われて、
誰も手を出さなかった筈だろう。

engChrName: Of course, you guys had already snagged its keycard at the time.
engSearchText:
Of course, you guys had already snagged its keycard at
the time.
jpnChrName: 当然、あそこのアクセスキーは とっくにアンタらが確保していただろう。
jpnSearchText:
当然、あそこのアクセスキーは
とっくにアンタらが確保していただろう。

engChrName: Though it probably became invalid once you joined our team.
engSearchText:
Though it probably became invalid once you joined
our team.
jpnChrName: だがチーム『アークライド解決事務所』に編入され、 アクセスキーは無効になった筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
だがチーム『アークライド解決事務所』に編入され、
アクセスキーは無効になった筈だ。

engChrName: My theory's that the surveillance system issued another once that happened.
engSearchText:
My theory's that the surveillance system issued
another once that happened.
jpnChrName: ──その時点で、あの入口のアクセスキーが “監視システム”に再発行されていたら……？
jpnSearchText:
──その時点で、あの入口のアクセスキーが
“監視システム”に再発行されていたら……？

engChrName: Oh. I didn't even think of that.
engSearchText: Oh. I didn't even think of that.

engChrName: The surveillance system favors fairness above all else.
engSearchText: The surveillance system favors fairness above all else.
jpnChrName: どうやら“監視システム”はフェアな進行を 何よりも重視してるみたいです……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら“監視システム”はフェアな進行を
何よりも重視してるみたいです……

engChrName: So it logically follows that if someone obtained that newly issued replacement keycard...
engSearchText:
So it logically follows that if someone obtained that
newly issued replacement keycard...
jpnChrName: 仮にその再発行されたアクセスキーを “誰か”が手に入れていたとしたら──
jpnSearchText:
仮にその再発行されたアクセスキーを
“誰か”が手に入れていたとしたら──

engChrName: ...they'd've been registered as the twentieth team.
engSearchText: ...they'd've been registered as the twentieth team.
jpnChrName: そいつらが２０番目のチームとして 新たにエントリーしたってことかよ……！
jpnSearchText:
そいつらが２０番目のチームとして
新たにエントリーしたってことかよ……！

engChrName: So now we have another team to worry about...
engSearchText: So now we have another team to worry about...
jpnChrName: ２０番目の、チーム……！
jpnSearchText: ２０番目の、チーム……！

engChrName: If it was a violation of the rules, we would've been informed of it this morning, which tells me this must be a loophole.
engSearchText:
If it was a violation of the rules, we would've been
informed of it this morning, which tells me this must
be a loophole.
jpnChrName: 朝のような警告がない以上、 ルールの隙間を上手く突いたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
朝のような警告がない以上、
ルールの隙間を上手く突いたようだ。

engChrName: I haven't a clue as to their aim, but I can't help but be impressed by their ingenuity.
engSearchText:
I haven't a clue as to their aim, but I can't help but be
impressed by their ingenuity.
jpnChrName: いやはや、何が目的かは分からぬが よくぞ目を付けたといった所か。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、何が目的かは分からぬが
よくぞ目を付けたといった所か。

engChrName: If we take all of these facts into account, there are only a few possible candidates.
engSearchText:
If we take all of these facts into account, there are
only a few possible candidates.
jpnChrName: ですがそうなってくると “候補”はある程度限られてきますね。
jpnSearchText:
ですがそうなってくると
“候補”はある程度限られてきますね。

engChrName: It must be someone we met in the game that knew about us joining forces with another team.
engSearchText:
It must be someone we met in the game that knew
about us joining forces with another team.
jpnChrName: 昨日の時点で、わたくし達と協力者方が 手を結んでいるのを知り得る存在でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
昨日の時点で、わたくし達と協力者方が
手を結んでいるのを知り得る存在でしょう。

engChrName: Yet another mystery to add to the pile. That's the last thing we need right now.
engSearchText:
Yet another mystery to add to the pile. That's the last
thing we need right now.
jpnChrName: ああもう、ここに来て なんで余計な謎が増えるかなぁ……！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、ここに来て
なんで余計な謎が増えるかなぁ……！

engChrName: (Wait... It couldn't be...)
engSearchText: (Wait... It couldn't be...)
jpnChrName: （……それって、もしかして……）
jpnSearchText: （……それって、もしかして……）

engChrName: Well, there's no point stressin' over it. If they're starting out today, they're gonna be short on cards.
engSearchText:
Well, there's no point stressin' over it. If they're
starting out today, they're gonna be short on cards.
jpnChrName: ……ま、今は考えても仕方ねえ。 後から参戦ならキーも足りねぇはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、今は考えても仕方ねえ。
後から参戦ならキーも足りねぇはずだ。

engChrName: We've already got the six we need, so we just need to book it to the end of the zone.
engSearchText:
We've already got the six we need, so we just need to
book it to the end of the zone.
jpnChrName: こっちはもう６つ揃ってる── 今は最奥に辿り着くのが優先だろ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちはもう６つ揃ってる──
今は最奥に辿り着くのが優先だろ。

engChrName: True enough.
engSearchText: True enough.
jpnChrName: ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……そうだな。

engChrName: Time to put that soldier boy outta commission.
engSearchText: Time to put that soldier boy outta commission.
jpnChrName: ああ……次はどうやら 軍人野郎が待ってるらしいしなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……次はどうやら
軍人野郎が待ってるらしいしなァ。

engChrName: Let's do this thing, you guys.
engSearchText: Let's do this thing, you guys.
jpnChrName: ええ……今は前進あるのみね。
jpnSearchText: ええ……今は前進あるのみね。

engChrName: We better hurry. The time limit's creeping up on us, so let's get moving!
engSearchText:
We better hurry. The time limit's creeping up on us,
so let's get moving!
jpnChrName: タイムリミットも近付いてます。 何とか辿り着きましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
タイムリミットも近付いてます。
何とか辿り着きましょう……！

engChrName: Keycards confirmed. The door has been unlocked.
engSearchText: Keycards confirmed. The door has been unlocked.
jpnChrName: 規定数のアクセスキーを認証。 ロックを解除。
jpnSearchText:
規定数のアクセスキーを認証。
ロックを解除。

engChrName: So, Team Arkride Solutions is the first to arrive once again. I certainly didn't anticipate that.
engSearchText:
So, Team Arkride Solutions is the first to arrive
once again. I certainly didn't anticipate that.
jpnChrName: 辿り着いたか、裏解決屋。 上層に続いて一番乗りとはな。
jpnSearchText:
辿り着いたか、裏解決屋。
上層に続いて一番乗りとはな。

engChrName: You're one of the people responsible for the incident in Basel...
engSearchText:
You're one of the people responsible for the incident
in Basel...
jpnChrName: バーゼルでも暗躍してたっていう……
jpnSearchText: バーゼルでも暗躍してたっていう……

engChrName: About time we settled the score, you son of a bitch.
engSearchText: About time we settled the score, you son of a bitch.
jpnChrName: 追い詰めたぜ、軍人野郎が。 やっとケリをつけられそうじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
追い詰めたぜ、軍人野郎が。
やっとケリをつけられそうじゃねぇか？

engChrName: I never imagined fate would bring us together once more.
engSearchText:
I never imagined fate would bring us together
once more.
jpnChrName: あの時ラングポートで会った お前たちとここまでの因縁になるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
あの時ラングポートで会った
お前たちとここまでの因縁になるとはな。

engChrName: It's almost as if our destinies were meant to be entwined.
engSearchText:
It's almost as if our destinies were meant to
be entwined.
jpnChrName: だが……これも宿命（さだめ）か。
jpnSearchText: だが……これも宿命（さだめ）か。

engChrName: Probably wasting my breath askin' this, but you mind surrendering? It'd save us a lot of trouble.
engSearchText:
Probably wasting my breath askin' this, but you
mind surrendering? It'd save us a lot of trouble.
jpnChrName: ──念の為聞くが、 大人しく投降するつもりはねぇな？
jpnSearchText:
──念の為聞くが、
大人しく投降するつもりはねぇな？

engChrName: Never.
engSearchText: Never.
jpnChrName: 無論だ──
jpnSearchText: 無論だ──

engChrName: I have yearned to find a place where I can die—and now that I have, I do not intend to submit so readily.
engSearchText:
I have yearned to find a place where I can die—and
now that I have, I do not intend to submit so readily.
jpnChrName: 絶好の“死に場所”を前に 戦わぬ理由があろうはずもない。
jpnSearchText:
絶好の“死に場所”を前に
戦わぬ理由があろうはずもない。

engChrName: He has taken the drug enhancement!
engSearchText: He has taken the drug enhancement!
jpnChrName: ドラッグブースト……！
jpnSearchText: ドラッグブースト……！

engChrName: How can you not feel a lick of shame using that crap?
engSearchText: How can you not feel a lick of shame using that crap?
jpnChrName: ハッ、軍人上がりが クスリに頼るってか！？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、軍人上がりが
クスリに頼るってか！？

engChrName: Don't you have any pride? I thought you were a soldier!
engSearchText:
Don't you have any pride? I thought you were
a soldier!
jpnChrName: 戦士の風上にも置けません……！
jpnSearchText: 戦士の風上にも置けません……！

engChrName: I've long since abandoned that path, and I have no need to cling to a soldier's code of honor.
engSearchText:
I've long since abandoned that path, and I have no
need to cling to a soldier's code of honor.
jpnChrName: すでに自分は外道を往（ゆ）く者。 戦場での矜持（きょうじ）などとうに捨てている。
jpnSearchText:
すでに自分は外道を往（ゆ）く者。
戦場での矜持（きょうじ）などとうに捨てている。

engChrName: I left that all behind the moment I murdered my own father and betrayed the man I swore to serve.
engSearchText:
I left that all behind the moment I murdered my own
father and betrayed the man I swore to serve.
jpnChrName: 父を殺め──尽くすべき “主”を見捨てた、あの時にな。
jpnSearchText:
父を殺め──尽くすべき
“主”を見捨てた、あの時にな。

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?

engChrName: You...did what now?
engSearchText: You...did what now?
jpnChrName: ……それって………
jpnSearchText: ……それって………

engChrName: My lord was among the vilest of men.
engSearchText: My lord was among the vilest of men.
jpnChrName: ……どこまでも愚かな主だった。
jpnSearchText: ……どこまでも愚かな主だった。

engChrName: He cared not for anyone but himself. When his own country turned to salt and collapsed, he turned his back on his people and fled.
engSearchText:
He cared not for anyone but himself. When his own
country turned to salt and collapsed, he turned his
back on his people and fled.
jpnChrName: 自国が“塩”と化して亡びゆく中、 護るべき民を見捨てて逃げることを選ぶような。
jpnSearchText:
自国が“塩”と化して亡びゆく中、
護るべき民を見捨てて逃げることを選ぶような。

engChrName: My family—his royal guardsmen—followed suit. I was only five at the time. My father trained me in martial arts so that I could serve our master.
engSearchText:
My family—his royal guardsmen—followed suit.
I was only five at the time. My father trained me in
martial arts so that I could serve our master.
jpnChrName: 当時、俺は５歳──だが近衛の家系に生まれ、 亡命先で父から軍用格闘術を教わり“主”に仕えた。
jpnSearchText:
当時、俺は５歳──だが近衛の家系に生まれ、
亡命先で父から軍用格闘術を教わり“主”に仕えた。

engChrName: Though as my lord grew in age, so, too, did his greed. He longed to reclaim his home...
engSearchText:
Though as my lord grew in age, so, too, did his greed.
He longed to reclaim his home...
jpnChrName: ──だが、老いさらばえてもなお我欲にまみれた “主”は故郷を取り戻すことを諦めなかった。
jpnSearchText:
──だが、老いさらばえてもなお我欲にまみれた
“主”は故郷を取り戻すことを諦めなかった。

engChrName: ...and his moment arrived when a leader of the Northern Jaegers, who ran the country in his absence, fell in battle.
engSearchText:
...and his moment arrived when a leader of the
Northern Jaegers, who ran the country in his absence,
fell in battle.
jpnChrName: 《北の猟兵》──ノーザンブリアを 何とか存続させてきた今は無き猟兵団。
jpnSearchText:
《北の猟兵》──ノーザンブリアを
何とか存続させてきた今は無き猟兵団。

engChrName: He seized the moment to begin his conquest— moving to occupy the city of Haliask. He ordered us to assist.
engSearchText:
He seized the moment to begin his conquest—
moving to occupy the city of Haliask. He ordered us
to assist.
jpnChrName: そのリーダー格の一人が戦死した隙を突いて 旧公都ハリアスクを占拠しようとしたのだ。
jpnSearchText:
そのリーダー格の一人が戦死した隙を突いて
旧公都ハリアスクを占拠しようとしたのだ。

engChrName: His lofty ambitions had no hope of coming to fruition, though. We quickly found ourselves surrounded.
engSearchText:
His lofty ambitions had no hope of coming to
fruition, though. We quickly found
ourselves surrounded.
jpnChrName: ……当然上手く行くはずもなく失敗し、 何とか包囲網を突破しようとしたその時──
jpnSearchText:
……当然上手く行くはずもなく失敗し、
何とか包囲網を突破しようとしたその時──

engChrName: As we scoured for any means of escape, our lord gave my father and I another order—forge an opening by slaying our poverty-stricken countrymen.
engSearchText:
As we scoured for any means of escape, our lord gave
my father and I another order—forge an opening by
slaying our poverty-stricken countrymen.
jpnChrName: “主”は父と俺に、貧困に喘ぐ市民たちを 虐殺して、その隙に離脱することを命じた。
jpnSearchText:
“主”は父と俺に、貧困に喘ぐ市民たちを
虐殺して、その隙に離脱することを命じた。

engChrName: That was one order I could not carry out. I may not have lived in the city for long, but they were still my people.
engSearchText:
That was one order I could not carry out. I may not
have lived in the city for long, but they were still
my people.
jpnChrName: 俺は悩んだ──幼き頃とはいえ、 同じ都に住んでいた同胞（はらから）たちだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は悩んだ──幼き頃とはいえ、
同じ都に住んでいた同胞（はらから）たちだ。

engChrName: My father sensed my hesitation and branded me a traitor. Then, he challenged me to a duel to the death—even though he did not wish to do so.
engSearchText:
My father sensed my hesitation and branded me
a traitor. Then, he challenged me to a duel to the
death—even though he did not wish to do so.
jpnChrName: そんな懊悩（おうのう）を見抜き、父は俺を裏切り者と 断じて罵った上で“決闘”を仕掛けてきた。
jpnSearchText:
そんな懊悩（おうのう）を見抜き、父は俺を裏切り者と
断じて罵った上で“決闘”を仕掛けてきた。

engChrName: I fought like my life depended on it, weaving between strikes from his iron fists and trading blow for blow.
engSearchText:
I fought like my life depended on it, weaving between
strikes from his iron fists and trading blow for blow.
jpnChrName: ……当然、本心ではなかっただろう。 だが俺は剛拳を必死に躱し、死力を振り絞り……
jpnSearchText:
……当然、本心ではなかっただろう。
だが俺は剛拳を必死に躱し、死力を振り絞り……

engChrName: In the end, I was the victor. As my fist pierced his chest, his final words were 'be a prisoner no more.'
engSearchText:
In the end, I was the victor. As my fist pierced his
chest, his final words were 'be a prisoner no more.'
jpnChrName: 最後に父の胸を拳で貫いていた── 『もう囚われるな』という言葉を聞きながら。
jpnSearchText:
最後に父の胸を拳で貫いていた──
『もう囚われるな』という言葉を聞きながら。

engChrName: Then...I fled. I abandoned my master and became a soulless wanderer. I lost everything—my people, my home...and the place where I was meant to die.
engSearchText:
Then...I fled. I abandoned my master and became a
soulless wanderer. I lost everything—my people, my
home...and the place where I was meant to die.
jpnChrName: そうして俺は“主”を見捨てて離脱し、 死に場所すら失って大陸各地を彷徨（さまよ）い……
jpnSearchText:
そうして俺は“主”を見捨てて離脱し、
死に場所すら失って大陸各地を彷徨（さまよ）い……

engChrName: Then five years ago, I met my new master here in Calvard.
engSearchText:
Then five years ago, I met my new master here
in Calvard.
jpnChrName: ５年前、この国で新たな“主”に出会った。
jpnSearchText: ５年前、この国で新たな“主”に出会った。

engChrName: I...see. So it all began with the Salt Pale crisis thirty years ago...
engSearchText:
I...see. So it all began with the Salt Pale crisis thirty
years ago...
jpnChrName: ………そう、だったのか…………
jpnSearchText: ………そう、だったのか…………

engChrName: You were there when that all went down, weren't you, Master?
engSearchText:
You were there when that all went down, weren't
you, Master?
jpnChrName: ……ノーザンブリアの《塩の杭》事件。 ３０年前に師父（せんせい）が立ち会った……
jpnSearchText:
……ノーザンブリアの《塩の杭》事件。
３０年前に師父（せんせい）が立ち会った……

engChrName: The people of North Ambria are finally beginning life anew, but they had to endure so much to get there.
engSearchText:
The people of North Ambria are finally beginning
life anew, but they had to endure so much to
get there.
jpnChrName: 苦難の自治州から帝国の占領を経て ようやく新たに歩み始めましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
苦難の自治州から帝国の占領を経て
ようやく新たに歩み始めましたけど……

engChrName: It's such a sad story.
engSearchText: It's such a sad story.
jpnChrName: ……まさか裏側で そんな出来事があったなんて……
jpnSearchText:
……まさか裏側で
そんな出来事があったなんて……

engChrName: That must've happened shortly after Sara's dad passed on.
engSearchText:
That must've happened shortly after Sara's dad
passed on.
jpnChrName: ……それもサラの お義父さんが亡くなった直後に……
jpnSearchText:
……それもサラの
お義父さんが亡くなった直後に……

engChrName: Your former master sounds like the scum of the earth.
engSearchText: Your former master sounds like the scum of the earth.
jpnChrName: ……最低ですね…… その“主”というのは……
jpnSearchText:
……最低ですね……
その“主”というのは……

engChrName: That's putting it lightly. He was a real piece of shit, by the sounds of it...
engSearchText:
That's putting it lightly. He was a real piece of shit,
by the sounds of it...
jpnChrName: ああ、クソ野郎だったのは 間違いねえだろうが──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、クソ野郎だったのは
間違いねえだろうが──

engChrName: ...but you don't get to use him or that sob story as an excuse for what you've done. Not on my watch.
engSearchText:
...but you don't get to use him or that sob story as an
excuse for what you've done. Not on my watch.
jpnChrName: てめえがアルマータでやってきた事の 言い訳になるとでも思うのか……？
jpnSearchText:
てめえがアルマータでやってきた事の
言い訳になるとでも思うのか……？

engChrName: I know. My hands are stained with the blood of many innocents.
engSearchText:
I know. My hands are stained with the blood of
many innocents.
jpnChrName: 無論、ありえん── この手は余りに多くの血に塗れている。
jpnSearchText:
無論、ありえん──
この手は余りに多くの血に塗れている。

engChrName: My path was set in stone from the moment I first encountered my master.
engSearchText:
My path was set in stone from the moment I first
encountered my master.
jpnChrName: だが俺は“彼”に拾われた──
jpnSearchText: だが俺は“彼”に拾われた──

engChrName: He is a man who lives to spread fear wherever he walks. He may as well be a reaper in human form...
engSearchText:
He is a man who lives to spread fear wherever
he walks. He may as well be a reaper in
human form...
jpnChrName: 恐怖を振りまいて歩く“死”そのもの。
jpnSearchText: 恐怖を振りまいて歩く“死”そのもの。

engChrName: ...and that is the perfect kind of master for a fiend who murdered his own father in cold blood.
engSearchText:
...and that is the perfect kind of master for a fiend
who murdered his own father in cold blood.
jpnChrName: 父を殺め、主を見捨てた“外道”が 最後に尽くすには何よりも都合の良い相手に。
jpnSearchText:
父を殺め、主を見捨てた“外道”が
最後に尽くすには何よりも都合の良い相手に。

engChrName: He saw right through me. He knew I was looking for a place where I could die, and he promised to grant my wish.
engSearchText:
He saw right through me. He knew I was looking for
a place where I could die, and he promised to grant
my wish.
jpnChrName: 俺が死に場所を捜していることを見抜き、 絶好の機会を与えてくれると約束した彼に。
jpnSearchText:
俺が死に場所を捜していることを見抜き、
絶好の機会を与えてくれると約束した彼に。

engChrName: Okay, I've heard enough. Time for me to finally avenge my bros...
engSearchText:
Okay, I've heard enough. Time for me to finally
avenge my bros...
jpnChrName: ああそうかよ──ようやく これでセイたちの仇が討てるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああそうかよ──ようやく
これでセイたちの仇が討てるぜ。

engChrName: ...by opening your goddamn eyes to the truth! I'm gonna show you just how misguided you really are!
engSearchText:
...by opening your goddamn eyes to the truth!
I'm gonna show you just how misguided you
really are!
jpnChrName: てめえみてぇな勘違い野郎の 目を覚まさせてやることでな……！
jpnSearchText:
てめえみてぇな勘違い野郎の
目を覚まさせてやることでな……！

engChrName: ...You have grown substantially since our first meeting. I can see it in your eyes.
engSearchText:
...You have grown substantially since our
first meeting. I can see it in your eyes.
jpnChrName: ……良い目だ。 あれから成長したようだな。
jpnSearchText:
……良い目だ。
あれから成長したようだな。

engChrName: Words no longer hold any meaning here, then.
engSearchText: Words no longer hold any meaning here, then.
jpnChrName: ならばこれ以上の言葉は不要── 確かめさせてもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ならばこれ以上の言葉は不要──
確かめさせてもらうぞ。

engChrName: Will this be my final resting place—or will it be yours? Let us find out.
engSearchText:
Will this be my final resting place—or will it
be yours? Let us find out.
jpnChrName: ここが俺の“死に場所”なのか、 あるいはお前たちのなのかをな……！
jpnSearchText:
ここが俺の“死に場所”なのか、
あるいはお前たちのなのかをな……！

engChrName: Bring it!
engSearchText: Bring it!
jpnChrName: 上等だ──！！
jpnSearchText: 上等だ──！！

engChrName: Our enemy is prepared to throw away his life, but I won't let that happen!
engSearchText:
Our enemy is prepared to throw away his life, but I
won't let that happen!
jpnChrName: 相手は死兵── 何としてもねじ伏せるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
相手は死兵──
何としてもねじ伏せるぞ！

engChrName: Careful, everyone! Foes who have nothing to fear are the most dangerous enemies of all!
engSearchText:
Careful, everyone! Foes who have nothing to fear are
the most dangerous enemies of all!
jpnChrName: 相手は死兵……！ 皆さん、気を付けてください！
jpnSearchText:
相手は死兵……！
皆さん、気を付けてください！

engChrName: This guy's basically an undead monster, right? Cool. Wanted to perform an exorcism.
engSearchText:
This guy's basically an undead monster, right? Cool.
Wanted to perform an exorcism.
jpnChrName: 見事なまでの死兵── これは祓い甲斐がありそうだ！
jpnSearchText:
見事なまでの死兵──
これは祓い甲斐がありそうだ！

engChrName: Our foe is jumping at the chance to throw everything away. I say we let him! ...After we wear him down, of course.
engSearchText:
Our foe is jumping at the chance to throw
everything away. I say we let him! ...After we wear
him down, of course.
jpnChrName: 相手は死兵…… 何とか削らせてもらおかなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
相手は死兵……
何とか削らせてもらおかなぁ！

engChrName: Deploying shards! This guy's a fast one, so be on your guard!
engSearchText:
Deploying shards! This guy's a fast one, so be on
your guard!
jpnChrName: シャード全開……！ 質量とスピードに気をつけろ！
jpnSearchText:
シャード全開……！
質量とスピードに気をつけろ！

engChrName: You're finished.
engSearchText: You're finished.
jpnChrName: ──終わりだな。
jpnSearchText: ──終わりだな。

engChrName: *pant* So it seems.
engSearchText: *pant* So it seems.
jpnChrName: ああ……そのようだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……そのようだ。

engChrName: W-We did it!
engSearchText: W-We did it!
jpnChrName: や、やった……！
jpnSearchText: や、やった……！

engChrName: Yes!
engSearchText: Yes!
jpnChrName: ……見事です……！
jpnSearchText: ……見事です……！

engChrName: Now, strike me down.
engSearchText: Now, strike me down.
jpnChrName: ──殺せ。
jpnSearchText: ──殺せ。

engChrName: That is the privilege—no, the duty of any victor in war. I will not live on in shame for a moment longer.
engSearchText:
That is the privilege—no, the duty of any victor
in war. I will not live on in shame for a
moment longer.
jpnChrName: 戦場において、それも勝者の役目だ。 これ以上生き恥を晒すつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
戦場において、それも勝者の役目だ。
これ以上生き恥を晒すつもりはない。

engChrName: So...do it. This place...will be my tomb.
engSearchText: So...do it. This place...will be my tomb.
jpnChrName: やれ──俺はもう、ここでいい。
jpnSearchText: やれ──俺はもう、ここでいい。

engChrName: Sorry, but no. That's not how we roll.
engSearchText: Sorry, but no. That's not how we roll.
jpnChrName: ……断る。
jpnSearchText: ……断る。

engChrName: You said earlier you aren't followin' your code of honor anymore, so we won't, either. We aren't even soldiers to begin with.
engSearchText:
You said earlier you aren't followin' your code of
honor anymore, so we won't, either. We aren't even
soldiers to begin with.
jpnChrName: 生憎、俺たちは軍人じゃない。 戦場の流儀とやらに従う義理もねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
生憎、俺たちは軍人じゃない。
戦場の流儀とやらに従う義理もねぇ。

engChrName: The Warriors of Kruga don't believe in senseless murder, and that's exactly what this would be.
engSearchText:
The Warriors of Kruga don't believe in senseless
murder, and that's exactly what this would be.
jpnChrName: そもそも無用な殺生は 戦士団の流儀でもありません。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも無用な殺生は
戦士団の流儀でもありません。

engChrName: There you have it.
engSearchText: There you have it.
jpnChrName: ま、そういうこった。
jpnSearchText: ま、そういうこった。

engChrName: I get that you have a death wish and all, but we aren't exactly the wish-granting type. You're outta luck, bud.
engSearchText:
I get that you have a death wish and all, but we aren't
exactly the wish-granting type. You're outta
luck, bud.
jpnChrName: 誰がてめぇなんぞの言いなりになって 介錯なんかしてやるかって話だ。
jpnSearchText:
誰がてめぇなんぞの言いなりになって
介錯なんかしてやるかって話だ。

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnSearchText: …………くっ………………

engChrName: So...I have failed to meet death yet again...
engSearchText: So...I have failed to meet death yet again...
jpnChrName: ……俺はまた、死に損なうのか……
jpnSearchText: ……俺はまた、死に損なうのか……

engChrName: Damn right you have. You aren't getting off the hook that easily—not after all you've done.
engSearchText:
Damn right you have. You aren't getting off the hook
that easily—not after all you've done.
jpnChrName: ああそうだ──“死に逃げ”なんて フザけた真似、誰が許すかってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああそうだ──“死に逃げ”なんて
フザけた真似、誰が許すかってな。

engChrName: You're gonna carry the weight of your sins for the rest of your life. I'll make damn sure of that.
engSearchText:
You're gonna carry the weight of your sins for the rest
of your life. I'll make damn sure of that.
jpnChrName: 一生背負ってもらうぞ──てめぇの親父や セイたちの死を、アルマータでやった全てを。
jpnSearchText:
一生背負ってもらうぞ──てめぇの親父や
セイたちの死を、アルマータでやった全てを。

engChrName: What he said. And once you're done living out your life with that weight on your back...
engSearchText:
What he said. And once you're done living out your
life with that weight on your back...
jpnChrName: そうだな…… そうやって背負い続けて、生を全うしたら。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……
そうやって背負い続けて、生を全うしたら。

engChrName: ...maybe the whole 'be a prisoner no more' bit from your dad will finally sink in.
engSearchText:
...maybe the whole 'be a prisoner no more' bit from
your dad will finally sink in.
jpnChrName: 今度こそ──アンタの親父が言ってた 『もう囚われるな』の意味が分かるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
今度こそ──アンタの親父が言ってた
『もう囚われるな』の意味が分かるんじゃねえか？
……………………！

engChrName: Heh. You people are quite strange.
engSearchText: Heh. You people are quite strange.
jpnChrName: ………フッ……不思議な連中だ…………
jpnSearchText: ………フッ……不思議な連中だ…………

engChrName: Had I met someone like you after I left my home, my life would have taken a different course. Perhaps a better one, even.
engSearchText:
Had I met someone like you after I left my home, my
life would have taken a different course. Perhaps a
better one, even.
jpnChrName: ……故国を去ったあと、ボスではなく お前たちのような者に出会えていたら……
jpnSearchText:
……故国を去ったあと、ボスではなく
お前たちのような者に出会えていたら……

engChrName: Nevertheless...it's too late to turn back the clock.
engSearchText: Nevertheless...it's too late to turn back the clock.
jpnChrName: だが──全ては遅すぎた。
jpnSearchText: だが──全ては遅すぎた。
ッ……！？

engChrName: You fool!
engSearchText: You fool!
jpnChrName: ──馬鹿野郎ッ！！
jpnSearchText: ──馬鹿野郎ッ！！

engChrName: Raaaagh!
engSearchText: Raaaagh!
jpnChrName: ──おおおおおおっ！！
jpnSearchText: ──おおおおおおっ！！

engChrName: Gah!
engSearchText: Gah!
jpnChrName: がはッ……
jpnSearchText: がはッ……

engChrName: Damn it...
engSearchText: Damn it...
jpnSearchText: ……クソ……

engChrName: You...used me?
engSearchText: You...used me?
jpnChrName: ッ……人をダシに……
jpnSearchText: ッ……人をダシに……

engChrName: *pant* Sorry. But there's...no going back for me now.
engSearchText: *pant* Sorry. But there's...no going back for me now.
jpnChrName: ………悪いが……… ……もう後戻りなどできない……
jpnSearchText:
………悪いが………
……もう後戻りなどできない……

engChrName: Finally... I can go to the place...I belong...
engSearchText: Finally... I can go to the place...I belong...
jpnChrName: ………ようやく逝ける…… ……行くべきだった所、へ……──
jpnSearchText:
………ようやく逝ける……
……行くべきだった所、へ……──
っ……
………ぁ…………
…………………………
……っ……

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Don't worry about me. This isn't like what happened with Aida, and it's not like it's my first time, either.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about me. This isn't like what happened
with Aida, and it's not like it's my first time, either.
jpnChrName: ……火喰鳥（アイーダ）の時とはワケが違う。 そして、初めてってワケでもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……火喰鳥（アイーダ）の時とはワケが違う。
そして、初めてってワケでもねぇ。

engChrName: In a spriggan's line of work, sometimes the situation calls for it—and I'll be damned if I let anyone else here take on that burden.
engSearchText:
In a spriggan's line of work, sometimes the situation
calls for it—and I'll be damned if I let anyone else
here take on that burden.
jpnChrName: これも裏解決屋の顔の一つ── とはいえ背負うのは俺だけでいい。
jpnSearchText:
これも裏解決屋の顔の一つ──
とはいえ背負うのは俺だけでいい。

engChrName: Screw that.
engSearchText: Screw that.
jpnChrName: ……ざけんな。
jpnSearchText: ……ざけんな。

engChrName: This one's on me. I underestimated just how deep his despair ran, and I let my guard down.
engSearchText:
This one's on me. I underestimated just how deep his
despair ran, and I let my guard down.
jpnChrName: 今のは１００パー俺の油断だ。 こいつの絶望を見誤ってた……
jpnSearchText:
今のは１００パー俺の油断だ。
こいつの絶望を見誤ってた……

engChrName: So don't give me that 'I'm the only one who'll carry this burden' shit.
engSearchText:
So don't give me that 'I'm the only one who'll carry
this burden' shit.
jpnChrName: ──勝手に自分一人で 背負うつもりになってんじゃねぇぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──勝手に自分一人で
背負うつもりになってんじゃねぇぞ。
っ………

engChrName: He tried to force Van's hand—just so he would kill him.
engSearchText:
He tried to force Van's hand—just so he would
kill him.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんに斃されるのを 見越した最後の悪あがき……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんに斃されるのを
見越した最後の悪あがき……

engChrName: I won't let you bear this alone.
engSearchText: I won't let you bear this alone.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん一人に、背負わせません。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん一人に、背負わせません。

engChrName: I won't, either. It's too heavy a load for one person.
engSearchText: I won't, either. It's too heavy a load for one person.
jpnChrName: うん……こんなもの、 一人じゃ抱えさせられないよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん……こんなもの、
一人じゃ抱えさせられないよ。
…………………………

engChrName: This one's on me. I underestimated just how deep his despair ran, and I let my guard down.
engSearchText:
This one's on me. I underestimated just how deep his
despair ran, and I let my guard down.
jpnChrName: 今のは１００パー俺の油断だ。 こいつの絶望を見誤ってた……
jpnSearchText:
今のは１００パー俺の油断だ。
こいつの絶望を見誤ってた……

engChrName: He tried to force Van's hand—just so he would kill him.
engSearchText:
He tried to force Van's hand—just so he would
kill him.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんに斃されるのを 見越した最後の悪あがき……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんに斃されるのを
見越した最後の悪あがき……

engChrName: I can only hope he has found peace at last.
engSearchText: I can only hope he has found peace at last.
jpnChrName: せめて解放されたら…… そう願わざるを得ません。
jpnSearchText:
せめて解放されたら……
そう願わざるを得ません。

engChrName: We'll have to carry this sin with us. Just as with Viola.
engSearchText: We'll have to carry this sin with us. Just as with Viola.
jpnChrName: ……背負うしかあるまい。 先のヴィオーラと同じく。
jpnSearchText:

フフ、いいでしょう。
それまではこちらで預からせてもらいます。

engChrName: Depending on what we learn from him, however, it may not be easy to convince the powers that be to release him from our custody.
engSearchText:
Depending on what we learn from him, however, it
may not be easy to convince the powers that be to
release him from our custody.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、聞き取りした内容次第では 簡単には引き渡せないかもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、聞き取りした内容次第では
簡単には引き渡せないかもしれませんが。

engChrName: Those damn elders...
engSearchText: Those damn elders...
jpnChrName: ハッ、長老どもの意見もありそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、長老どもの意見もありそうだな。

engChrName: But I will do everything within my power to ensure he is brought to the authorities when we are done. You have my word.
engSearchText:
But I will do everything within my power to ensure
he is brought to the authorities when we are done.
You have my word.
jpnChrName: ……私も可能な限り 見届けるようにするから。
jpnSearchText:
……私も可能な限り
見届けるようにするから。

engChrName: That's reassuring to hear, at least.
engSearchText: That's reassuring to hear, at least.
jpnChrName: ええ、よろしく頼んだわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、よろしく頼んだわ。

engChrName: ...So you don't trust us with him, then.
engSearchText: ...So you don't trust us with him, then.
jpnChrName: ……わたしたちじゃ 信用できない、とか？
jpnSearchText:
……わたしたちじゃ
信用できない、とか？

engChrName: What? No. I'm doing this 'cause I know you guys are stretched thin.
engSearchText:
What? No. I'm doing this 'cause I know you guys are
stretched thin.
jpnChrName: いや、そういう意味じゃねえ。 だがギルドも今は人員不足だろう。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そういう意味じゃねえ。
だがギルドも今は人員不足だろう。

engChrName: Probably would be hard to work with the local cops, too, so I think this is the best option we've got.
engSearchText:
Probably would be hard to work with the local cops,
too, so I think this is the best option we've got.
jpnChrName: 現地警察とも連携が取りづらいだろうし この状況下なら落とし所と思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
現地警察とも連携が取りづらいだろうし
この状況下なら落とし所と思ってな。

engChrName: *sigh* The truth hurts.
engSearchText: *sigh* The truth hurts.
jpnChrName: ふう、正直納得はできないけど。
jpnSearchText: ふう、正直納得はできないけど。

engChrName: Hate to admit it, but we do have a lot on our plate as it is.
engSearchText:
Hate to admit it, but we do have a lot on our plate as
it is.
jpnChrName: ……地上の対応もあることを考えると たしかに落とし所かもしれんな。
jpnSearchText:
……地上の対応もあることを考えると
たしかに落とし所かもしれんな。

engChrName: Could you do us a solid and arrange for them to hand him over to the capital police when all of this is over?
engSearchText:
Could you do us a solid and arrange for them to hand
him over to the capital police when all of this is over?
jpnChrName: ただしこの件が終わったら首都警察に 引き渡すよう交渉は頼めるか？
jpnSearchText:
ただしこの件が終わったら首都警察に
引き渡すよう交渉は頼めるか？

engChrName: That's the plan.
engSearchText: That's the plan.
jpnChrName: ああ、その辺は任せてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その辺は任せてくれ。

engChrName: I think handin' him over to the guild is our best bet, even if they're short-staffed.
engSearchText:
I think handin' him over to the guild is our best bet,
even if they're short-staffed.
jpnChrName: ……ま、ここはギルドに 引き渡すのが無難だろう。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、ここはギルドに
引き渡すのが無難だろう。

engChrName: I'll give Elaine a call.
engSearchText: I'll give Elaine a call.
jpnChrName: あいつらも人手不足だろうが、 不動たちに連絡してみねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
あいつらも人手不足だろうが、
不動たちに連絡してみねぇとな。

engChrName: Don't forget that Renne's there, too. She can help out if need be.
engSearchText:
Don't forget that Renne's there, too. She can help out
if need be.
jpnChrName: はい、レン先輩もいますし 上手く段取ってくれそうです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、レン先輩もいますし
上手く段取ってくれそうです。

engChrName: You, uh, sure that's a good idea?
engSearchText: You, uh, sure that's a good idea?
jpnChrName: 黒月に……いいのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 黒月に……いいのかよ？

engChrName: I'm not keen on the idea, either, but the guild's stretched thin right now.
engSearchText:
I'm not keen on the idea, either, but the guild's
stretched thin right now.
jpnChrName: ……ギルドも今は人員不足だろう。
jpnSearchText: ……ギルドも今は人員不足だろう。

engChrName: Probably would be hard to work with the local cops, too, so I think this is the best option we've got.
engSearchText:
Probably would be hard to work with the local cops,
too, so I think this is the best option we've got.
jpnChrName: 現地警察とも連携が取りづらいだろうし この状況下なら落とし所と思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
現地警察とも連携が取りづらいだろうし
この状況下なら落とし所と思ってな。

engChrName: I'm plannin' to ask them to hand him over to the capital police when this is all over, though.
engSearchText:
I'm plannin' to ask them to hand him over to the
capital police when this is all over, though.
jpnChrName: ただしこの件が終わったら首都警察に 引き渡すように交渉するつもりだが。
jpnSearchText:
ただしこの件が終わったら首都警察に
引き渡すように交渉するつもりだが。

engChrName: It's hard to feel at ease when Heiyue is involved...but there aren't many other viable alternatives.
engSearchText:
It's hard to feel at ease when Heiyue is involved...but
there aren't many other viable alternatives.
jpnChrName: 正直、安心とは言い難いですけど…… たしかに落とし所かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
正直、安心とは言い難いですけど……
たしかに落とし所かもしれませんね。

engChrName: At least Ri—I mean, Yin is with them. She'll stop them from going too far. Of that I'm certain.
engSearchText:
At least Ri—I mean, Yin is with them. She'll stop
them from going too far. Of that I'm certain.
jpnChrName: まあリー……《銀》もいる以上、 滅多なことはさせないでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
まあリー……《銀》もいる以上、
滅多なことはさせないでしょ。

engChrName: *sigh* And after going through all the trouble of beating him up...
engSearchText:
*sigh* And after going through all the trouble of
beating him up...
jpnChrName: やれやれ、折角の手柄だし うちで引き取りたかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、折角の手柄だし
うちで引き取りたかったけど。

engChrName: I'd love to take custody of him, but I'll let this one go.
engSearchText: I'd love to take custody of him, but I'll let this one go.
jpnChrName: 君が身を挺して導いた以上、 ここは譲るべきかな？
jpnSearchText:
君が身を挺して導いた以上、
ここは譲るべきかな？

engChrName: We cannot seize custody by force. Doing so would be violating the samurai code of honor.
engSearchText:
We cannot seize custody by force. Doing so would be
violating the samurai code of honor.
jpnChrName: 確かに──強引に奪っては 侍衆の義に悖りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
確かに──強引に奪っては
侍衆の義に悖りましょう。

engChrName: Sweet. Thanks for bein' so chill about it. (Ah. So their client must be...)
engSearchText:
Sweet. Thanks for bein' so chill about it.
(Ah. So their client must be...)
jpnChrName: そうしてくれると助かるぜ。 （こいつらの雇い主はやはり……）
jpnSearchText:
そうしてくれると助かるぜ。
（こいつらの雇い主はやはり……）

engChrName: So you're sparing the wolf who has bared his teeth at you and your flock? How foolish.
engSearchText:
So you're sparing the wolf who has bared his teeth at
you and your flock? How foolish.
jpnChrName: フフ、どちらにせよ甘ちゃんやねぇ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、どちらにせよ甘ちゃんやねぇ。

engChrName: Perhaps we ought to save you from yourselves. I hereby offer to send him to sleep with the fishes.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we ought to save you from yourselves.
I hereby offer to send him to sleep with the fishes.
jpnChrName: やっぱ消した方がええんちゃう？ 今なら代わりにやったげてもええんよ？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱ消した方がええんちゃう？
今なら代わりにやったげてもええんよ？

engChrName: Offer rejected. Keep your filthy paws to yourselves, both of you.
engSearchText:
Offer rejected. Keep your filthy paws to yourselves,
both of you.
jpnChrName: ……させねぇよ。 少なくとも俺の目の前ではな。
jpnSearchText:
……させねぇよ。
少なくとも俺の目の前ではな。

engChrName: Why, though? He's lost the will to go on, so he's as good as dead, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
Why, though? He's lost the will to go on, so he's as
good as dead, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: ハン、完全に戦意喪失した野郎なんぞ 勝手にすりゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、完全に戦意喪失した野郎なんぞ
勝手にすりゃあいい。

engChrName: You've gone soft, Arkride. Hope that doesn't come back to bite you one day.
engSearchText:
You've gone soft, Arkride. Hope that doesn't come
back to bite you one day.
jpnChrName: ま、せいぜい後悔しねぇことだな？
jpnSearchText: ま、せいぜい後悔しねぇことだな？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Whatever.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Whatever.
jpnChrName: ハッ……ご忠告ありがとうよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……ご忠告ありがとうよ。

engChrName: Not long after...
engSearchText: Not long after...
jpnChrName: 少し後──オラシオン地下某所。
jpnSearchText: 少し後──オラシオン地下某所。

engChrName: That concludes our report.
engSearchText: That concludes our report.
jpnChrName: ──状況報告は以上です。
jpnSearchText: ──状況報告は以上です。

engChrName: As for Alexandre, he was delivered into the guild's custody.
engSearchText:
As for Alexandre, he was delivered into the
guild's custody.
jpnChrName: なおアレクサンドルの身柄は ギルド方面に引き渡されました。
jpnSearchText:
なおアレクサンドルの身柄は
ギルド方面に引き渡されました。

engChrName: As for Alexandre, he appears to have been delivered into Heiyue's custody.
engSearchText:
As for Alexandre, he appears to have been delivered
into Heiyue's custody.
jpnChrName: なおアレクサンドルの身柄は 黒月方面で確保されたようです。
jpnSearchText:
なおアレクサンドルの身柄は
黒月方面で確保されたようです。

engChrName: That's one less problem to contend with.
engSearchText: That's one less problem to contend with.
jpnChrName: ある意味、手間は省けたか……
jpnSearchText: ある意味、手間は省けたか……

engChrName: I am afraid we cannot compromise on our mission. You should focus on your primary task as well.
engSearchText:
I am afraid we cannot compromise on our mission.
You should focus on your primary task as well.
jpnChrName: 悪いがこちらにも“任務”がある。 ──そちらも主目的を果たすといい。
jpnSearchText:
悪いがこちらにも“任務”がある。
──そちらも主目的を果たすといい。

engChrName: That outcome does not change any of our plans, however. How fare the arrangements for the other target?
engSearchText:
That outcome does not change any of our
plans, however. How fare the arrangements for the
other target?
jpnChrName: ……我々のやることに変更はない。 “もう一つの標的”の裏取りは？
jpnSearchText:
……我々のやることに変更はない。
“もう一つの標的”の裏取りは？

engChrName: They are complete, sir.
engSearchText: They are complete, sir.
jpnChrName: 完了しています。
jpnSearchText: 完了しています。

engChrName: We have given our report to the captain and secured permission to execute the target.
engSearchText:
We have given our report to the captain and
secured permission to execute the target.
jpnChrName: 僧兵長にも報告済み── “断罪”許可も下りています。
jpnSearchText:
僧兵長にも報告済み──
“断罪”許可も下りています。

engChrName: Are you certain you will not require our aid, sir?
engSearchText: Are you certain you will not require our aid, sir?
jpnChrName: ですが本当に 副兵長一人で宜しいのですか？
jpnSearchText:
ですが本当に
副兵長一人で宜しいのですか？

engChrName: I would prefer to operate independently while on the surface. You can gather intelligence in the meantime.
engSearchText:
I would prefer to operate independently while on
the surface. You can gather intelligence in
the meantime.
jpnChrName: 地上ではかえって動きやすいだろう。 引き続き情報収集は頼む。
jpnSearchText:
地上ではかえって動きやすいだろう。
引き続き情報収集は頼む。

engChrName: Let the preparations for the heretic hunt begin.
engSearchText: Let the preparations for the heretic hunt begin.
jpnChrName: ──これより《外法狩り》の準備を始める。
jpnSearchText: ──これより《外法狩り》の準備を始める。

engChrName: Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: はっ……！
jpnSearchText: はっ……！

engSearchText: November 22nd, 1208, 7:00AM

engSearchText: Keycard confirmed.

Team Arkride Solutions can now enter the

engSearchText: A fearsome foe is prowling around.

jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: The door is tightly locked.
engSearchText: The door is tightly locked.
jpnChrName: 扉は固く閉ざされている。
jpnSearchText: 扉は固く閉ざされている。

engChrName: The second round doesn't start until tomorrow morning, right?
engSearchText:
The second round doesn't start until tomorrow
morning, right?
jpnChrName: 次のフェーズは明日の 早朝開始でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
次のフェーズは明日の
早朝開始でしたね。

engChrName: Yeah. So let's get our prep work done today.
engSearchText: Yeah. So let's get our prep work done today.
jpnChrName: ああ、今日中に 済ませる事はやっておくぞ。

ああ、今日中に
